main event: A military radar detection picked up an unidentified object over the Gulf of Mexico on 13 January 1960.
interesting points: The object was detected at an estimated speed of 1,000 mph and altitude of 38,000 ft,Initial radar pickup was made from a distance of 60 mm, Air Traffic Control followed the object on one radar for 13 seconds, No other aircraft were reported in the area during the sighting, The object was categorized as 'assumed phenomena' after consultation with military personnel.
witness description: military personnel including navigators, radar officers, and gunners
